about_the_game:
In a post-apocalyptic world, take the wheel of a tank and become a legendary hunter! "Tank Brothers" is a top-down action roguelike game that combines retro RPG elements, offering you an unprecedented adventure in a world after the end. Recruit companions with unique personalities, gather equipment, upgrade your tank, capture criminals, and uncover the secrets of the world.

Features include:

  • Diverse Companions: Each with unique skills to enrich your tactical options.

  • Powerful Equipment: Enhance your tank's combat strength to take on stronger enemies.

  • Versatile Builds: Different schools of thought adapt to various tank configurations and pilot setups.

Epic Boss Battles: Exploit your enemies' weaknesses and outsmart them for victory. Tank Customization: Personalize your tank to boost performance and appearance.

Join "Tank Brothers" and pen your legend on the wasteland!
